Articles.Content:
It is too expensive to launch craft to recover kerbals from orbit, so it's easier to deorbiting them with an orbital

cannon(like Danny.... Did). But there is a problem: my kerbals always die, so is there a trick to increase the chances of the survival of your kerbals when they crash into the terrain?

­

Edited February 11, 2023 by CREEDOFTROLLS
Landing on someones head is the best way. It may not work all times, but yeah.

Yeah. Kerbals can survive impacts better if they land on their head. Hold left-mouse-button and drag it around to rotate the kerbal while their jetpack is turned on. They're more fragile than they used to be. It's worth noting that under many circumstances kerbals are actually tougher than the stock command pods.
